analysis.description:
Memes.DoDev (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#171-178) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(dval) (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol)

Memes.Buy (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#97-171) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- TimeFinish == 0
	- TimeFinish == 1

Memes.Buy (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#97-171) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- TimeLeft < TimerStartTime (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#155-159)
	- TimeFinish == 1 (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#105-109)
	- TimeFinish == 0 (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#100-109)

Memes.BasicPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#28-30)
Memes.DIVP should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#18-19)
Memes.PIncr should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#16-17)
Memes.POTP should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#20)
Memes.TimerResetTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#12)
Memes.TimerStartTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#13-14)
Memes.WPOTPART should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#22)
Memes.helper should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#9-11)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'ID' of Memes.Buy (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#97-98) is not in mixedCase
Memes.WPOTPART (/unique_chucks/15/0xe1cc1e5a679cbb7c6817a0cfecdb7c7284e8f47d.sol#22) is never used in Memes
